review: Absolutely LOVE this device! We were formerly using a WII to stream Netflix and would get frustrated with the searching and choosing of programs. Amazon fire has taken away all that angst!  So simple to set up. ( remember to buy the HDMI cable because it isn't included, around $12). Since getting this we are now subscribed to Hulu Plus and are using our Amazon Prime Instant video on almost a daily basis. I also use the Amazon Fire to watch YouTube videos.The remote control is super easy to use. The voice search feature is so handy and makes searching a breeze.This device makes it so easy to ditch your expensive cable or satellite TV. Netflix and Hulu Plus are under $20 a month combined. So for an initial outlay of $99 (or the $84 we got it for) we're saving about $140 a month by not needing cable or satellite TV anymore.You really can't go wrong with this device.

review: I had such high hopes for the Fire TV, but unfortunately it just didn't work for us. Unlike our Roku, it constantly buffers and it couldn't manage to open Netflix at all. I am not sure why it has such loading issues since our Roku is more than three years old.We also didn't like that the device automatically purchases HD content, you have to click a few more times to get SD content, which when you have a slow connection, is really not helpful. Apple TV provides a way to download only SD content in your preferences.We are sending this back.
